snippet.title: Hot Milk | Ghibli Orchestra Edition | Snail's House/Ujico Cover
snippet.description:
My time for music has just increased significantly due to things lightening in medical school so get ready for many more releases to come... I've always been a listener of Snail's House and when "Hot Milk" popped up, I couldn't resist doing my own take on this unique song. I definitely experimented with some new minimalist orchestral textures in this one that I ended up liking quite a bit.

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/1tdHPEu7gU9axrfswtGmhL
Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/ca/artist/seycara-orchestral/1578478878
